Uses of Class
geometry.planar.Polyline

  • Packages that use Polyline 
    Package Description
    board
    Contains classes describing items on a printed circuit board and the board itself.
    geometry.planar
    Contains general purpose 2-dimensional geometry classes.
    tests
    Contains functions for testing and checking the consistancy of the board database.

      Splits this polyline at the line with number p_line_no into two by inserting p_endline as concluding line of the first split piece and as the start line of the second split piece.
